title: Alcatel A3 10 1 GB RAM 16 GB ROM 10 inch with Wi-Fi Only Tablet (Black)

product_specification.Sales Package: Tablet, Battery, AC Power Adapter, USB Cable, User Manual, Warranty Card
product_specification.Other Display Features: LED Backlit Display with IPS Technology
product_specification.Video Formats Supported: DivX, XviD, MPEG4, VP8, H.263, H.264
product_specification.Audio Formats Supported: AAC, AMR, AWB, MP3, OGG, WAV
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year on Tablet, 6 Months on Accessories

product_description.Enjoy the View: The Alcatel A3 provides an immersive video experience and makes the characters in your favourite movies come to life, thanks to the amazing 25.4-cm (10) IPS HD display.
product_description.Blazing Fast: Whether it's watching HD videos, playing games, or browsing the Internet, the Alcatel A3, powered by a 1.3 GHz quad-core processor and 1 GB of RAM, hits it out of the park.
product_description.Take Impressive Pictures: Capture your favourite moments with the 5 MP rear camera, and take beautiful selfies using the 2 MP front camera.
product_description.Impressive Features: The A3 10 Wi-Fi includes a plethora of features - you can project photos and videos on your TV screen using Miracast, transfer data to and from your tab using the micro USB port. Its Wi-Fi capability lets you enjoy unlimited entertainment. Also, the 16 GB of ROM, which can be expandable up to an additional 32 GB, lets you store all your photos, music, and videos with ease.
product_description.Never Run Out of Power: Enjoy an uninterrupted video experience, thanks to the high-performance 4060 mAh battery, which provides up to seven hours of continuous video playback.
product_description.Immersive Sound: The speakers and the superior sound wave provide a theatre-like experience right in your hands.
product_description.Elegant Design: The stylish A3 is as elegant as it is effective. This 9.5-mm tablet is lightweight and easy to handle.

review: the best tab in gaming, display etc.. I would recommend everyone to buy this.the price is really affordable.Tab is really big in size looks quite superb in 10" display. I got a free back cover nd screen card too.charging is fine.delivery was at time.packing was also good. I'm totally satisfied with this product. thank u flipkart😀I hope this review was helpful for everyone..

Good product as compared to price. 1st of all it is two year old device widely known as "Alcatel OneTouch Pixi 3 10" and again relaunched in India by Alcatel as "Alcatel A3 10 wifi version " on 15th February with alcatel pop 4.

Note that the sample pics which are shown in flipkart site or is totally different although the shape n size is almost same as the a3 10 4g but the major difference is the front camera which is actually in the middle instead of the conner and sadly there is no dual speaker in the front like the a3 10 4g variant.

Box Contains-
10.1 inch Tablet, 5v 2amp Charger along with a Data cable, Below average type earphone, a Screengaurd and a Plastic backcover with pixi branding.

Pros-
1- 1Gb ram out of 434 mb left after first boot.
2- screen resolution is 1280x800 with 212 ppi.
3- Bluetooth v4.0 works fine with my Zoook
Encore no issue.
4- Comes with 10 point multitouch.
5- Otg supports.
6- Touch is smooth and responsive with
double tapp to awake features.
7- Comes with lots preinstalled apps which
can be disable in app settings to reduce
ram usage.
8. It can play 1080p video without lag.

Cons-
1-Build quality is not good as it totally plastic.
2- 4060 mah Li-ion battery not Li-Po.
3- Start lagging after opening 3-4 heavy apps
simultaneously. (Like Chrome, Play Store,
Facebook ).
4- Only comes with accelerometer sensor.
5- Screen color temp. is warm not white.
6- No split screen as it is running on Lolipop
with Android security patch of oct 2017.
7- There is a single Speaker at the back side n
audio quality is average.
8- In terms of camera don't expect nothing.


Conclusion-
Good 10.1 inch tablet within 7k with vivd display n descent specs.
As I order it to read ebooks, newspapers in Jio newspaper app and for browsing and it does all these stuff without any issue n lag. If you want multi-tasking and gaming then go for pop 4.

I wanted a 10 inch tablet and was tight on budget. I gave this tablet a try because it's made by Alcatel (which is a trademark of nokia). Alcatel-Lucent is a very big name in telecommunications, but not so famous in india. Turns out I got a jackpot. Personally even I wasn't expecting such a nice tablet for rs.7000. Initially it was slow but after updating all softwares it is working smoothly. Back cover is provided for free. Battery life is amazing, but it takes time to charge fully. Overall it's a really nice product. If you want something big to read pdf this tablet is a go.

I really liked it because of it's 10inch display good for reading , watching movies, education purpose, value for money battery is ok , sound is okay happy to buy it for my dad e really likes it . at this rate it is worth to buy .
its good . but some time due to 1 gb ram . it works slow. but fine . in that much prize its ok.

I have been looking for an affordable big screen tablet for quite some time. My other 7" tablet was getting old and its small screen wasn't quite made for reading books or mags. This Alcatel tablet that I got for a great bargain price just meets all my needs. It's got a big screen that's just right for endless reading, a big battery that really lasts and a great screen. They have very thoughtfully included a back case as well as a screen guard for the tablet (in the package). I don't use heavy apps or gaming apps so I cant vouch for those, but for those bibliophiles out there, this is just perfect!

ya after using for 2 weeks .... i can say one who prefer to read Pdf .....notes .... its best to afford.... as price also in budget....... battery last almost 7 hours on screen. wifi supports fast ...

At the price - it is a very good buy.
on the pros
(1) Good size. seems large.
(2) Good display.
on the cons
(1) gets slightly slow / lag if you open multiple apps

in all a very good buy at the price offered.

1. the battery life is good around 6 to 10 hrs screen on time. battery capacity is 4100 mah.

2. performance is good for daily work for two or three opened at once time.

3. audio is at back side and average.

4.quality of screen is good is IPS display but contrast ration is average.

5. good for net surfing and reading books.
below 320p video looks bad.

6. the tablet is good around 6000 RS.

conclusion. if have budget above 20000 RS then don't go for it otherwise after habit you will like this tablet.

good tab but could have been better ..speaker output is not that great .. and 1 gb ram sometimes feel a bit low .. overall battery backup is decent not too shabby .. display is not that good .. i mean brightness is great but colour reproduction is not upto the mark . blacks are not black ... and the display is reflective too. but it's a budget tab in that point of view a good product .. 👍🏼 great work alcatel(buy this product people it's a by part of nokia)😜😜

the best tab in gaming, display etc.. I would recommend everyone to buy this.the price is really affordable.Tab is really big in size looks quite superb in 10" display. I got a free back cover nd screen card too.charging is fine.delivery was at time.packing was also good. I'm totally satisfied with this product. thank u flipkart😀I hope this review was helpful for everyone..

If you are willing to put up with mediocre performance, this is a great device for reading and media consumption. Apps take a while to load and browsing isn't very great either but if you use an efficient browser and apps like Kindle or flipboard, it's pretty decent. It can play YouTube at full hd resolution, if you're willing to wait a while on loading times. overall, pretty good for magazines, music and movies.

Performance of this tablet PC is very poor. Apps open very slowly and are unusable most of the times. Ordered a 1gb ram version by mistake and repenting it now. Had asked for a return on the day it arrived before I opened the package. But, the seller refused to take the return. This was a very unpleasant online purchase experience. If I had bought this in a offline store, I am sure I would not have been in this situation. I feel cheated by Flipkart. I will never do an online purchase of expensive items on Flipkart.

Also, there is no option to return. There is an option to replace my current tab. I know for sure that the replacement I receive will also be of same quality as it is an issue because of lesser RAM.
